item.description:
Why do our modern lives perpetuate so many struggles? We resist things that don't feel good to us, and we fight, combat and declare war on issues we don’t fully understand. What keeps us in such perpetual struggle is the fact that we truly do not understand the attitude and manner we need to adopt in order to address these issues and events with equanimity and strength. Meet Mother Clare Watts, Christian Master Teacher, who through this seminar will introduce you to a new way of being: the way of acceptance, the only way to heal.

 

 

 

About the Presenter...

Mother Clare Watts is the co-director of a mystical Christian school and Order called the Order of Christ/Sophia. She is an ordained Master Teacher and Priest, holding a Master’s Degree in Counseling Psychology with post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and is a Certified Professional Midwife. She is also the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment. Watch her on YouTube.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Master Teacher Seminar: Acceptance: The Only Way to Heal
